data.text: If you don't warn him first then you can't complain later. Karma is a wicked, wicked witch. I saw a friend go through this and the people who accused him of sexual harassment ended arrested for other things or ended up dead. The one who died, did so in a car accident. Be careful.

When it comes back to you it will be ten times worse than what you dished out. If these men are guilty of sexual harassment then it should have been dealt with in the moment. You should have slapped his face and told him to never let it happen again. They deserved a warning.

There doesn't need to be any truth behind an accusation. The networks will bow down to you because you are a woman yelling sexual harassment and threatening a law suit. It doesn't matter that you should have proof of your accusations. But beware!!! WHAT GOES AROUND COMES AROUND.

It's called sexual harassment. All you have to do is yell sexual harassment and point a finger to get rid of any man that gets in your way or makes you angry. Maybe he said something you didn't like. It doesn't matter. Women lie also.
